item.title: Viewpoint: If Bitcoin Holds Above $11,690 Buyer Cost Price Short-Term Top, It Could Regain Upside Momentum
item.description: On August 7th, Glassnode stated in a post that Bitcoin (BTC) is currently attempting to regain the short-term top buyers' cost price (approximately $11.69k). If it remains below this level, the market is more prone to enter a long consolidation phase or further retrace to the $11k price range.According to HTX market data, Bitcoin is currently trading at $11.68k with a 24-hour increase of 2.45%.

item.title: Multiple Whale Addresses Accumulate ETH in Past 10 Hours, with Total Purchase Amount Exceeding $42 Million
item.description: On August 7th, according to the monitoring of The Data Nerd, in the past 10 hours, several whales have been continuously withdrawing Ethereum (ETH) from exchanges.The address beginning with 0x526 withdrew 3000 ETH, which is approximately equivalent to $11.17 million.The address starting with 0xF436 withdrew 5630 ETH, approximately equivalent to $20.91 million.The address starting with 0x1cd withdrew 1080 ETH, approximately equivalent to $4 million.Abraxas withdrew 1700 ETH, approximately equivalent to $6.45 million.

item.title: Bank of England Cuts Interest Rates by 25 Basis Points as Scheduled
item.description: On August 7th, the Bank of England reduced interest rates by 25 basis points, lowering the benchmark interest rate from 4.25% to 4%. This marked the fifth interest rate cut in this easing cycle, which was in line with market expectations. (FXStreet)

item.title: US Stock and Cryptocurrency Futures Extend Gains in Pre-market Trading, BTCS Up Nearly 10%
item.description: On August 7th, based on the market data from rockflow, the pre-market trading gains of US cryptocurrency-related stocks expanded. These included:Coinbase (COIN) with a pre-market gain of 2.93%;Circle (CRCL) having a pre-market gain of 3.15%;MicroStrategy (MSTR) with a pre-market gain of 1.30%;Bitmining (BMNR) with a pre-market gain of 7.65%;BTCS (BTCS) with a pre-market gain of 9.52%;Bit Digital (BTBT) with a pre-market gain of 5.52%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) with a pre-market gain of 7.95%.BlockBeats previously reported that Bloomberg stated that Trump is scheduled to sign an executive order on Thursday to permit 401(k) retirement funds to invest in alternative assets such as private equity, real estate, and cryptocurrency.

item.title: LD Capital Founder Jihan Yi: The best strategy in a bull market is to HODL and buy the dip
item.description: On August 7th, Richard Li Hua, the founder of LD Capital, posted on social media, expressing that Trump is more keen on seeing a rate cut and a rise in the crypto market than investors (a significant portion of his family's assets are in the crypto market). In the context of a definite bull market strategy, the optimal approach is to hold, wait for a pullback, and then increase positions.

item.title: A whale address withdrew 5631 ETH from a CEX in the past 6 hours.
item.description: On August 7th, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, Whale 0xF436 has once more withdrawn 5,631 ETH (valued at $20.91 million) from a centralized exchange within the past 6 hours. This withdrawal may be for the purpose of purchasing ETH for SharpLink Gaming.In addition, a newly established wallet 0x526D withdrew 3,000 ETH (worth $11.17 million) from Binance 30 minutes ago.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Past $116,000
item.description: On August 7th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin has shown a rebound and exceeded $116,000. It is currently trading at $116,053, with a 24-hour percentage increase of 1.8%.

item.title: In the past 1 hour, the entire network has witnessed $86.85 million in liquidations, with the largest single liquidation being a short position.
item.description: On August 7th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 1 hour, a total of $86.85 million was liquidated across the entire network. Among them, there was $1.42 million in long liquidations and $85.41 million in short liquidations.

item.title: Ethereum Surges to Touch $3800, With a 24-hour Gain of 4.66%
item.description: On August 7th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum has witnessed a significant surge and reached $3800, showing a 24-hour percentage change of 4.66%.

item.title: ETH/BTC Exchange Rate currently stands at 0.0328, with a 24-hour change of +3.31%.
item.description: On August 7th, based on HTX market data, the exchange rate of ETH to BTC is currently at 0.0328, and it has shown a 24-hour growth of 3.31%.
